params.adminManager: Address of the adminManager contract of the escrow platform.
params.client: Address of the client initiating actions within the escrow.

transferClientOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the account recovery module registered in the system.

params.newOwner: The address to which the client ownership will be transferred.

params.contractId: The identifier of the contract for which contractor ownership is being transferred.
params.newOwner: The address to which the contractor ownership will be transferred.

transferClientOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the client account to a new account.

transferContractorOwnership(uint256,addr.notice: Interface declaration for transferring contractor ownership.

documentation.text: @notice Thrown when no deposits are provided in a function call that expects at least one.
@notice Thrown when an invalid contract ID is provided to a function expecting a valid existing contract ID.
@notice Thrown when an invalid week ID is provided to a function expecting a valid week ID within range.
@notice Thrown when the available prepayment amount is insufficient to cover the requested operation.
